# CalmFlight

> A premium, offline-first iOS tool designed to eliminate flight anxiety through science, guided breathing, and cognitive distraction.

## Core Identity
* **What it is:** A self-help tool for nervous flyers. [cite_start]It replaces fear with physics and panic with calm[cite: 1, 2].
* [cite_start]**What it is NOT:** A medical device or a substitute for professional mental health treatment[cite: 4].
* [cite_start]**Platform:** Exclusively for iOS[cite: 3].
* **Business Model:** Lifetime access via a one-time purchase (â‚¬14.99); no recurring subscriptions.

## Technical Value Proposition
* **100% Offline Capability:** Designed specifically for Airplane Mode. [cite_start]No internet connection, login, or accounts are required to access any feature[cite: 3, 5, 6].
* [cite_start]**Hardware Integration:** Utilizes iPhone haptic engines for breathing synchronization and accelerometers for real-time stability visualization[cite: 7].

## Feature Set Summary
* [cite_start]**The Panic Button:** A structured, 2-minute emergency flow involving guided breathing and grounding techniques[cite: 2, 7].
* **Physics & Science:** Interactive educational modules explaining lift, thrust, and aerodynamics to demystify "scary" noises.
* **Cognitive Distraction:** Low-friction, focus-intensive games (Math, Memory, Sequence) to occupy the mind during turbulence.
* [cite_start]**Calm Audio:** High-quality background sounds designed to mask cabin noise[cite: 2, 7].

## Data & Privacy (Strict)
* **Data Collection:** Zero. No personal data is collected, transmitted, or stored outside the user's device.
* **Third-Party Sharing:** None. No data is sold or traded.
* **Compliance:** Standard Apple EULA; GDPR/Privacy compliant by design.
